about_the_game:
Step into the exhilarating world of TechnoFumer, the premier third-person shooter that immerses you in the role of a daring digital hunter! This thrilling, action-packed game tasks you with the mission of tracking down and neutralizing rogue YouTube influencers. Prepare for a heart-racing adventure as you navigate through intricately designed levels, sharpening your skills to achieve the highest scores and secure extraordinary rewards.

Access all game statistics, including the Hall of Fame, daily leaderboards, total playtime, player engagement, and much more, at:


🎯 Game Objectives:
In TechnoFumer, your objective is clear: secure the highest score within a month to claim spectacular prizes. Explore the digital realms to locate the elusive influencers, now controlled by a mysterious digital virus, and halt their disruptive spree!
As the game was initially conceived as a competition, there are no checkpoints; a single death means restarting from the beginning. It requires nerves of steel to complete the game.



💣 Gameplay:
Hunt the Infected: Traverse expertly crafted levels, from urban jungles to futuristic cities, in search of the infected influencers. Face a multitude of challenges, including advanced enemy AI and strategic boss encounters.
Strategize to Win: Each influencer presents a unique challenge and demands a tailored strategy to overcome. Adjust your tactics dynamically and demonstrate your prowess as a marksman.



🌐 Global Community:
Become part of a vibrant community of players. Share tips and experiences across social media platforms, engage in friendly rivalry, forge alliances, and exchange strategies to ascend as the ultimate TechnoFumer champion.



Are you prepared to embark on this thrilling journey and showcase your marksmanship against renowned YouTube influencers? Arm yourself, take precise aim, and conquer the TechnoFumer leaderboard today!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sonoma
  • Processor: Apple M2 Max
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M2 Max
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Sonoma
  • Processor: Apple M3 Max
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M3 Max
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Technofumer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 or Similar
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i9 or Above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX2080 or Above
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
